caption.center: D. BURCH, INC. D/B/A BABY DOLLS SALOON; M.D. II ENTERTAINMENT, INC.;
ALLEN BURCH, INC.; AND DUNCAN BURCH, INDIVIDUALLY Appellants v. CITY OF

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Fifth District, Dallas.

opinion.posture:
On Appeal from the 160th Judicial District Court, Dallas County, Texas, Trial Court Cause Nos. 99-00756-H, 99-00755-H, and 99-00754-H
DISMISSED
opinion.panel:
Before Chief Justice THOMAS AND Justices RICHTER and SPECTOR[fn1].
[fn1] The Honorable Rose Spector, Retired, Supreme Court of Texas, sitting by assignment.
opinion.opinion_byline: Opinion By Chief Justice LINDA THOMAS.
opinion.opinion_text: The Court has before it the joint motions for dismissal filed on November 18, 2002 and June 13, 2003, asserting the parties have entered a settlement agreement resolving the controversy. We GRANT the parties' motions. Accordingly, we DISMISS the appeal and, in accordance with the parties' request, assess costs against the party incurring the same.
